description: This unique collection of FIVE iconic wine estates is South Africa’s first fine wine Non-Fungible Tokens. Capturing past, present and future vintages, these unique digital contracts encompass vertical collections of Klein Constantia Vin de Constance, Kanonkop Paul Sauer, Meerlust Rubicon, Mullineux Olerasay and Vilafonté Series C. Each Strauss NFT holds between 20 and 50 vintages, with collections from 66 to 288 bottles.
name: Strauss & Co Vaults
